name: GoldenLand: Cold Heaven
description: Goldenland: Cold Heaven maintains the role system, nonlinear plot, expansive world, and turn-based combat of the original Goldenland 2, but it also adds a host of new features. On your way to Goldenland, you'll make many important decisions, affect the destinies of humans and other creatures, and visit exotic places in the northern country. This sequel not only takes you to five new cities, but also features new spells, classes, and perks that you can find during the game.
